Name: Hawa
description:
Hawa is a resident of Bugo cell and married with six kids. She is a business woman and a farmer dealing in coffee production and crafts making.

Hawa is a very hardworking woman and her aim is to increase her coffee production since she has gotten supply tenders from bulk buyers.

She is seeking a loan to buy medicated seedlings and manure for soil nutrition so she can be able to grow more coffee for harvesting and resell. Thank you funders.
